description:
Cody has become very used to be in front of the camera, but for this scene, Cody's trying something new, he's going to be picking up the camera and auditioning some female talent. Of course we'll be watching through our lens, capturing all the fun things Cody has planned for this new girl, Lilith Lavey.

Of course Cody won't just be getting her naked, but he'll also be sampling the goods. And by sampling we mean he'll film her undressing, and then he'll jump in front of the camera to film himself getting sucked, rimmed and then fucking this buxom blonde before unloading his eager balls all over her.

Enjoy!
title: Cody The Auditioner
